tool_description: Access Sephora's public data with our Scraper API for comprehensive information retrieval such as Search Results, Product Details and more.
name: Sephora
title: Sephora

api_list.name: Search By Brand

required_parameters.name: brandID
required_parameters.description: Can be accessed through the **Brands** endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: filters
optional_parameters.description:
Accessible from the JSON response under **filters** property.
Format: filterKey=filterValue||filterKey=filterValue||filterKey=filterValue...
filterKey can be the same, for example: Brand=Gucci||Brand=Givenchy

api_list.name: Product Reviews
api_list.description: Get Product Reviews Based on Product ID

required_parameters.name: productID
required_parameters.description: Can be accessed through the **Search** endpoints.

api_list.name: Search By Category

required_parameters.name: categoryID
required_parameters.description: Can be accessed through the **Categories** endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: filters
optional_parameters.description:
Accessible from the JSON response under **filters** property.
Format: filterKey=filterValue||filterKey=filterValue||filterKey=filterValue...
filterKey can be the same, for example: Brand=Gucci||Brand=Givenchy

api_list.name: Search By Keyword

optional_parameters.name: filters
optional_parameters.description:
Accessible from the JSON response under **filters** property.
Format: filterKey=filterValue||filterKey=filterValue||filterKey=filterValue...
filterKey can be the same, for example: Brand=Gucci||Brand=Givenchy

api_list.name: Brands
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sephora14.p.rapidapi.com/brands"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sephora14.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
